# Review Report Template（固定字段与顺序）

## 1. Commit-level Records
| record_id | commit_sha | scope | check_item | result | severity | evidence | risk_type | recommendation | blocking | open_questions |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|

## 2. PR/MR Summary
- conclusion: Pass|PassWithConditions|Reject
- blocker_count:
- high_count:
- medium_count:
- low_count:
- doc_gap: true/false

## 3. Decision Rationale
- requirement_fit_status:
- principle_conflict_status:
- security_stability_status:
- cross_impact_status:
